summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style video editor drag-and-drop functionality. All 11 requested features verified and working: project creation, video track addition, demo media buttons, media import section, media tiles with duration/icon, DRAG badge on hover, drag-drop to timeline, clip creation on track, clip title/duration display, clip selection with white ring, and multiple clips on same track.
passed_tests: Create new project and enter editor - PASSED (browser mode creates project and navigates to editor)
Add a Video Track using +Video button - PASSED (Video 1 track appears in timeline)
Add demo media using +Video button in 'Demo-Medien hinzuf√ºgen' section - PASSED (data-testid='add-demo-video' works)
Demo media appears in 'Importiert (X)' section - PASSED (shows 'Importiert (1)' or 'Importiert (2)')
Demo media tiles show video icon and duration (0:10) - PASSED (tiles display video icon and '0:10' duration)
Media tiles have 'DRAG' badge on hover - PASSED (blue 'DRAG' badge appears on hover)
Drag a demo video from Media Panel to Video Track - PASSED (drag-drop creates clip on timeline)
Clip appears on the Video Track after drop - PASSED (blue clip with title visible on Video 1 track)
Clip shows title and duration - PASSED (clip shows 'Demo Video.mp4', Inspector shows 'Dauer: 10.00s')
Clip can be selected (white ring appears) - PASSED (clicking clip shows selection border and populates Inspector)
Multiple clips can be added to the same track - PASSED (two clips visible on Video 1 track)
critical_code_review_comments: MediaInputPanel.jsx correctly implements draggable MediaTile with data-testid attributes
TimelinePanel.jsx Track component has proper onDragOver, onDragLeave, onDrop handlers
EditorLayout.jsx ADD_CLIP_TO_TRACK reducer correctly creates clips from dropped media
Clip component shows selection state with ring-2 ring-white class when selected
InspectorPanel correctly displays clip properties when a clip is selected
Demo media buttons (add-demo-video, add-demo-image, add-demo-audio) have proper data-testid attributes
context_for_next_testing_agent: Drag-and-drop functionality fully tested and working. Flow: 1) Create project via 'Neues Projekt erstellen' modal, 2) Click +Video in timeline to add Video Track, 3) Click [data-testid='add-demo-video'] to add demo media, 4) Drag media tile from 'Importiert' section to Video 1 track, 5) Clip appears on timeline with title. Selection works - clicking clip shows white ring and populates Inspector panel with clip properties. Multiple clips can be added to same track. Preview URL: https://video-forge-146.preview.emergentagent.com
